Package Controller

package Controller
  • Class
    Description
    Controller
    An abstract class that serves as a base for controllers in the application.
    ControllerEnterUsernameMenu
    A controller for managing username input in the application menu.
    ControllerHighscoreMenu
    A controller for managing highscore menu interactions in the application.
    ControllerLanguageMenu
    A controller for managing language selection in the application menu.
    ControllerMainMenu
    The ControllerMainMenu class handles the main menu interactions.
    ControllerSimulation
    The abstract ControllerSimulation class provides common functionality for all simulation controllers in the kiosk simulation.
    ControllerSimulationDayMenu
    The ControllerSimulationDayMenu class manages the interactions between the view and the simulation model for the daily menu in the kiosk simulation.
    ControllerSimulationEndMenu
    Controller for the end menu of the simulation.
    ControllerSimulationMarketMenu
    The ControllerSimulationMarketMenu class manages the interactions between the view and the simulation model for the market menu in the kiosk simulation.
    ControllerSimulationMenu
    The ControllerSimulationMenu class manages the interactions between the view and the simulation model for the main simulation menu in the kiosk simulation.
    ControllerSimulationPriceMenu
    The ControllerSimulationPriceMenu class manages the interactions between the view and the simulation model for the price menu in the kiosk simulation.
    ControllerSimulationStorageMenu
    The ControllerSimulationStorageMenu class extends ControllerSimulation and manages the storage of products in a simulation.
    InterfaceController
    The InterfaceController interface provides a method for setting user input in the controller.
    Main
    The main class of the application.
    ViewManager
    The ViewManager class is responsible for managing the different views and their controllers in the application.
